plot: Mohammed is a businessman with eyes set on the big prize. However, Mohammed finds himself lacking a creative atmosphere in the office and is looking for that one opportunity to set his ideas free.
title: Forgotten Dreams
plot_es: Mohammed is a businessman with eyes set on the big prize. However, Mohammed finds himself lacking a creative atmosphere in the office and is looking for that one opportunity to set his ideas free.
plot_en: Mohammed is a businessman with eyes set on the big prize. However, Mohammed finds himself lacking a creative atmosphere in the office and is looking for that one opportunity to set his ideas free.
